description: Excellent for programming the micro:bit micro-controller and flashing to it. Easy to use.
didnt know the dev was from the rasp pi foudation! thats an added bonus. if youre looking to program with python, and looking for an easy way to get it to your hardware, look no further!

The tab for installing Third Party Packages is not available.

Also pip3 install packagexx --target /snap/mu-editor/4/lib/python3.5/site-package

does not work.
Obviously setup.py or pyproject.toml is not found.

I'd to know how / where to install packages since I want to work on the book Automate the boring stuff with Python.

Have also started some projects before buying this book and want to keep
the projects separate because of the parallel installing of Python 3.8.2.

Appriciate any ideas respectively progress.

Best Regards
Armin
summary: Third Party Packages are not able to install
